EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS customer that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: RS Customer- 10% Disbursal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
BlueWave has disbursed the last 10% of your solar loan to {!Opportunity.Partner_tag2__c}.
BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
